note:
I filter out any post that links to Twitter / X because every time you click on it and visit X, you support it. If you want to share something you saw over there, post the content, don't link to it.

Treehugger. Born@324.01ppm. ❤️ Studied philosophy & management for the arts, former computer programmer, love running, science & fiction, coffee, art, dreaming of a better world. Work in education.

fields.name: Banner description
fields.value: My banner shows to blue-red climate barcode for The Netherlands, where I live, starting at 1900, all the way up to the 2020s. As everywhere, there are more and more red lines, indicating an increasing average temperature, aka climate change

fields.name: profile pic
fields.value: 48 year old me before my bookcase (subtle hint), with a half smile looking at the camera. Brown hair swept back from my forehead, brown eyes, blue shirt. And double sets of bags under my eyes, my family trademark, I guess
